pages.md:
# Remote Movie Recording Using a Web Browser

## Connecting by Scanning a QR Code

> üí° **Note:**  
> To connect a second or subsequent camera by scanning a QR code, set **SERVERTYPE** of the first camera and second and subsequent cameras to **HTTPS** in advance.

1. Select **INFORMATION > HARDWARE INFO** in the network/USB setting menu.  
   A QR code is displayed.

2. Tap the thumbnail of the **+** mark in the ‚ÄúChoose camera‚Äù area.

   !Choose Camera Area

3. Tap ‚ÄúConnect via QR Code‚Äù to scan the QR code displayed by the camera.  
   The remote recording display will appear in the browser.

   !QR Code Connection

## Disconnecting a Second or Subsequent Camera

To end a connection after adding a camera, select the ‚Äúremove connected device‚Äù option in the ‚ÄúRemote recording‚Äù menu and click or tap the thumbnail for the camera you want to remove.
